Translations.Text: Do you not see that We have sent the devils to the unbelievers, inciting them to sin
So do not try to expedite their punishment. We are simply counting down the number of their days
On the Day [of Judgment,] We will gather all the righteous as [an honored] delegation to the Merciful
and will drive those who forced others to reject Our messages to Hell like a thirsty herd
None will have [power to] intercede on their behalf except him who has received permission from the Merciful
And they say, "The Merciful-to-all has taken [for Himself] a son
You have done an atrocious thing
It almost causes the heavens to rupture, the earth to split open and the mountains to collapse in devastation
that they attribute a son to the Merciful
It does not befit the Merciful to take a son
There is no one in the heavens and earth who will not come as a servant to the Merciful
He has numbered them and counted them precisely
so that every one of them will appear alone before Him on the Day of Resurrection
The Merciful-to-all will bestow His affection on those who have believed and done righteous deeds
And We have made [this Qur'an] easy to recite [Prophet] so that you may give good news to the righteous and warning to stubborn people
How many generations have We destroyed before them? Do you see any one of them or even hear from them even a whisper
